radiographic_examinations.findings: Slight and homogeneous increased attenuation in the left lentiform nucleus.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up unenhanced brain CT performed 2 months later showed that the abnormal hyperattenuated lesion in the left lenticular nucleus had completely resolved.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Abnormally strong hyperintense signal in the posterior portion of the left putamen on T1-weighted images; isointensity on T2-weighted images; normal signal intensity in the left putamen on diffusion-weighted images.
